snippet: Pound, an author of the report that detailed corruption in Russia’s antidoping efforts, said he believed the country’s track team could still make it to the Rio de Janeiro Olympics next year.
lead_paragraph: Pound, an author of the report that detailed corruption in Russia’s antidoping efforts, said he believed the country’s track team could still make it to the Rio de Janeiro Olympics next year.

headline.main: Dick Pound Says Russia Can Make It to Rio Games
headline.print_headline: Pound Says Russia Can Make Rio
